text:
When insertRun(..) method of XWPFParagraph is called it inserts Run in correct place of document (it is seen if document is stored to file).

However, in XWPFParagraph.getRuns() Run is inserted in the end.

Patch with difference to trunk to fix this issue is attached.
creator: dkochelaev@gmail.com
dkochelaev@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26932
Patch to fix the described issue

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text: Thanks, applied (with unit test) in r1098923.
